title: Aleem Khan condemns Israeli attack on Iran
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 13 (APP):Federal Minister for Communications Abdul Aleem Khan on Friday strongly condemned the unjustified and brutal Israeli attack on Iran, terming it a blatant violation of Iran’s sovereignty and a serious breach of international laws. He warned that such aggression poses a grave threat to regional peace and stability.
In a statement shared on social media platform X, Abdul Aleem Khan expressed full solidarity with the people of Iran affirming that the people of Pakistan stand shoulder to shoulder with their Iranian brethren in this difficult time. He expressed deep sorrow over the loss of innocent lives and the destruction of Iranian property, describing the Israeli assault as deeply distressing and a cause for serious concern.
Abdul Aleem Khan further stated that such reprehensible actions cannot distract the world from the ongoing crisis in Gaza and Palestine. He urged the international community to play a constructive role in halting Israel’s aggressive actions which are pushing the region towards further instability and conflict.
